body.p: What is the best way to avoid being attacked through a vulnerability?

multiple_choice.choice: Avoid websites where people post personal links.
Keep all your Internet-facing software at the latest version.

response.feedback: Rebooting every morning is not necessary.
Personal links are not the problem.
People trying to attack your computer often target out-of-date software that has vulnerabilities.
Limiting your visits to only well-known websites won't really protect you. Reputable sites have at times been tricked into hosting exploits.
